title: 怎样隐藏玩家的财富排名？
author: Forly
txt_content: RT，因为不想让玩家看到管理员的金钱，所以有什么办法可以隐藏吗？

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
输入
/manuaddv builder -essentials.balancetop
/manuaddv builder -essentials.balance.others
即可

replies.author: Forly
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2016-8-7 11:27
输入
/manuaddv builder -essentials.balancetop
/manuaddv builder -essentials.balance.others
我应该没讲清楚，，，我是想只让某个玩家在财富排行中不出现。

replies.author: 凯文丶
replies.txt_content:
借用楼上回答的，答案却是不显示一整个权限组的，如果要实现不显示某玩家，需要这么改
/manuaddp builder -essentials.balancetop
/manuaddp builder -essentials.balance.others复制代码

replies.author: Forly
replies.txt_content:
凯文丶 发表于 2016-8-7 12:36
借用楼上回答的，答案却是不显示一整个权限组的，如果要实现不显示某玩家，需要这么改
 ...
可是显示The user doesn't have direct access to that permission怎么办？

replies.author: 小烦
replies.txt_content:
Forly 发表于 2016-8-7 14:25
可是显示The user doesn't have direct access to that permission怎么办？
/manudelv builder -essentials.balancetop

replies.author: 小烦
replies.txt_content:
小烦 发表于 2016-8-7 14:55
/manudelv builder -essentials.balancetop
/manudelp builder -essentials.balancetop

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
Forly 发表于 2016-8-7 12:05
我应该没讲清楚，，，我是想只让某个玩家在财富排行中不出现。
没有办法

replies.author: 凯文丶
replies.txt_content:
Forly 发表于 2016-8-7 14:25
可是显示The user doesn't have direct access to that permission怎么办？
搞错了，那个权限
/manuaddp builder -essentials.balance.others
把builder改玩家名字，就行，权限就给这一个就可以了

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
这种基本上无解
因为Ess没有这种配置
只能把管理的金钱设为0
【管理金钱不就是一个数吗 想多少就多少】
